DataLinkRemarks_Abridged.description: /// Collection of remarks associated with this data link message.

type.description:
Indicates the subject matter of the remark.
Example: /// Example: CONTINGENCY PROCEDURES
Constraints: Minimum length = 0, Maximum length = 64

text.description:
Text of the remark.
Example: /// Example: Example data link remarks
Constraints: Minimum length = 0, Maximum length = 128
